result.reason: Printer redirection failures are often environment-specific (drivers, server policies) or due to settings not updating on 'Reconnect'; the report lacks sufficient detail to distinguish these causes.
result.approach: Request client/server OS and driver details. Investigate if `RdpProtocol.Connect()` needs to re-apply properties (like `RedirectPrinters`) to ensure settings changes persist when reconnecting an existing session.
